brands.name: NASA
brands.description: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) is an independent agency of the U.S. federal government responsible for the civilian space program, as well as aeronautics and space research.

brands.name: Roscosmos
brands.description: The Russian Space Agency, also known as Roscosmos, is a state corporation responsible for the Russian space program and general aerospace research.

brands.name: SpaceX
brands.description: SpaceX is an American aerospace manufacturer and space transportation services company founded by entrepreneur Elon Musk with the goal of reducing space transportation costs and enabling the colonization of Mars.
